name: Thomas and the Evil Bunny Slippers
name_original: Thomas and the Evil Bunny Slippers
description:
The Game

Thomas wakes up in the middle of the night to discover that the bunny slippers he is wearing have become possessed! Quickly shuffle your feet over various objects to damage and destroy the slippers before they consume you!

The Jam

This game was created for the @themeatly game jam and I made it in about 40 hours. The game had to be horror and the theme for the jam was "unlikely evil" - antagonist had to be a character, object, or situation that is not normally considered evil. So...naturally...I chose bunny slippers :P

This was my very first game jam so it's pretty rough. I'm still learning how to make games with Unity/C# and it was also my very first attempt at pixel art (and it shows haha). Despite how the game came out, it was an amazing experience and I learned so much! I will definitely be doing more game jams in the future to help me grow as an indie game developer.
